course.title: Manage the cyber threat for finance professionals
course.shortDescription: In this course, we use scenarios/examples to examine the threat of a cyber-attack and good practices on mitigating the risk.
course.fullDescription: This course is designed for accountancy, finance and business professionals working in all organisations from small business, large corporates or financial services or who are just interested in learning more about the vulnerabilities organisations are exposed to and the options available to protect their organisation. With a focus on practical skills throughout, this course provides the ability to apply skills as well as understand them.
course.outcome:
• How to facilitate a risk assessment to identify the potential threats and the vulnerabilities they may exploit and the business impacts of a cyber-attack.

  • Recognise that the risks are constantly changing and the need for continuous process improvement. Including how to monitor and report on the effectiveness of the cyber/information security practices.

  • Understand how to manage an incident and the processes required to effectively respond and recover.

  • Understand that effective security protection is a combination of people, process and technology and how to create a culture of cyber and information security.

  • Understand the physical and logical access controls which should be implemented to adequately and appropriately protect the organisation’s information and technology resources.

  • Understand the potential risk responses and mitigation actions to appropriately and adequately protect the business from the identified cyber risks.
course.syllabusRaw:
1. Introduction

  • Objectives of the course

  • Outline of the cyber threat

  • What’s different about cyber

2. The basic hygiene factors

  • Secure configuration of IT infrastructure

  • Malware protection

  • Configuring network devices securely

3. Approach and effective access controls

  • Implement approaches and effective access controls

  • The importance of 2 factor authentication

4. Understand risks

  • Principles of risk management

Manging the risks effectively

5. Understand and manage third-party supplier risks

  • Manging the full supply chain

  • Information value and sensitivity

  • Supplier impacts on service delivery

6. Understand and manage third-party supplier risks

  • Manging the full supply chain

  • Encouraging a cyber-security aware culture

  • Words into actions

7. Respond and recovery

  • Incident management capability

  • Respond and recover plan for breaches

8. Continuous improvement

  • The need for performance monitoring

  • Defining appropriate KPIs

  • Performance dashboard

9. Skills and resources

  • The importance of access to the right skills

  • The need for up-to-date training

10. Concluding themes

staff.bio:
Mike is a Director of Prism RA, providing technology and cyber governance, risk, compliance, and security advisory and assurance services, in order to help organisations get the most out of their technology investment, improve the quality of the data they use for decision making, and improve their resilience in the event of a Cyber Attack.

With many years experience, including 8 years experience in mainstream IT and more than 20 years with KPMG, Mike possesses a wide range of GRC experience and a proven track record of helping organisations deliver business value from their use of IT. Mike holds a number of certifications, including CISM and CRISC.

Mike is extensively involved with ISACA, the global membership association for technology and cyber governance, risk, security professionals, playing leadership roles both at the local and international levels, including a term on ISACA’s International Board of Directors. Mike has also been part of the development team for a number of ISACA publications, including COBIT and GDPR and currently sits on ISACA Global’s Technology & Information Risk Advisory Board. Mike is also currently leading ISACA’s activities with the Cyber Security Alliance, a group of the UK’s cyber security related bodies, who are currently working on the UK’s Cyber Security Council establishment project, on behalf of the UK’s Government.

Mike is also heavily involved with training, he lectures on the exam preparation courses for ISACA’s four core certifications: CISM, CRISC, CISA & CGEIT. Mike has also presented a number of webinars for the ACCA, on Demystifying IT Audit and GDPR. Mike has also spoken at a number of conferences on managing the cyber risk.

In addition, Mike is a Non-Executive Director of CyberQ Group, an innovative and award winning cyber security services provider and he is also a member of the Cyber Advisory Board for Cranfield and Aston Universities and is a member of the UK's Institute of Directors (MIoD).

Clive deals with business and technology related matters from the perspective of the Chief Financial Officer. His research interests include the application of digital technologies to the finance function, and how they impact on the people and processes they support. His recent works includes the role of the finance business partner and the future of the Chief Financial Officer. Clive has worked for one of the Big 4 accountancy firms where he held several roles, including in IT Audit and Attestation and global Learning and Development.

He has a particular interest in the personal developmental aspects of an organisation, and his latest report considers the subject of diversity and inclusion across the accountancy and finance profession.

programs.title: FinTech for Finance and Business Leaders

program.title: FinTech for Finance and Business Leaders

course.title: Machine learning with Python for finance professionals
course.subtitle: A machine learning course focused on delivering practical Python skills for finance professionals looking to maximise their use of these time-saving tools within their organisation.

course.title: Manage the cyber threat for finance professionals
course.subtitle: In this course, we use scenarios/examples to examine the threat of a cyber-attack and good practices on mitigating the risk.

course.title: Robotic process and intelligent automation for finance
course.subtitle: In this course we explain how automation can play a key role in delivering the requirement to have robust processes and clean data. By using automation tools and machine learning, finance leaders can identify, implement and configure the right solutions for their organisation. It also shows how tools, such as Python, can be applied to finance processes and the benefits this will bring.

messages.prospectus.about.careers.description.v2: If you’re passionate about creating learning experiences that drive real progress, you’ll fit right in working alongside our purpose-driven team.
We measure our success by the lives and careers we’ve changed, and transparently share our outcomes for the benefit of all. Here are some of the things we’ve learned and achieved and how we prioritize student success in everything we do.
messages.prospectus.about.edx.opportunities.descr:
Universities and institutions partner with us to bring high-quality online education to learners across the globe. Together, we offer thousands of courses, professional certificates, boot camps, credit-bearing micro credentials, and undergraduate and graduate degrees.

And with edX for Enterprise, hundreds of industry-leading companies are harnessing our platform to create an impact at every level of their organization.

It’s our ambition to fuel every career journey and this is just the beginning.

Visit our newsroom for our latest partnerships, innovations, and announcements.
messages.prospectus.about.edx.opportunities.headi: Helping great organizations create greater opportunity
messages.prospectus.about.edx.page.description.v2: edX is an online learning destination and MOOC provider, offering high-quality courses from the world’s best universities and institutions to learners everywhere. We empower online learning in the classroom and around the globe. Learn more about our online courses and programs and enroll today.
messages.prospectus.about.edx.page.title: About Us
messages.prospectus.about.edx.story.description.p: Guided by our founding mission to eliminate the back row in higher education, 2U has spent over 15 years advancing the technology and innovation to deliver world-class learning outcomes at scale. In 2021, 2U acquired edX to create a global online learning platform that has delivered life-changing learning experiences to millions of people worldwide.

Today, under the leadership of 2U CEO Paul Lalljie and edX Founder and 2U Chief Platform Officer Anant Agarwal, edX connects millions of people with affordable, career-relevant learning opportunities.
messages.prospectus.about.edx.story.subheading.v2: Delivering world-class learning outcomes at scale
messages.prospectus.about.edx.summary.p1.v2: edX is the online learning platform from world-leading digital education company 2U, Inc.
messages.prospectus.about.edx.summary.p2: edX was founded by Harvard and MIT as an experiment to make the world’s best education available to everyone. Today, as part of 2U, edX connects over 81 million people worldwide with online learning that delivers real professional progress across nearly every career discipline, from artificial intelligence and robotics to sustainability and public health. Together with universities and organizations at the forefront of their fields, edX offers thousands of job-relevant programs designed to give every ambitious learner a path to achievement.
messages.prospectus.about.edx.vision.heading: Our Vision
messages.prospectus.about.edx.vision.list.commitm: Flexible pathways to personal and professional achievement.
Educational opportunities at every investment level.
messages.prospectus.about.edx.vision.list.descrip: 2U believes in the power of high-quality online education to create a better future for all. Through edX, our online learning platform, we see a world where learners everywhere have access to…

messages.prospectus.all-schools.friends-of-edx.li: Learn more about additional friends of edX
messages.prospectus.all-schools.headline: edX offers the highest quality online courses from institutions who share our commitment to excellence in teaching and learning.
messages.prospectus.all-schools.partnering.paragr: edX regularly partners with many different types of organizations from all around the world - academic institutions (from large research universities to polytechnics and liberal arts colleges), non-profit institutions, national governments, non-governmental organizations (NGOs), and multinational corporations in connection with its MicroMasters™ program and other educational programs and related services.

Where there is strong mission alignment with edX and the ability to commit strategic, course content, and/or financial contributions back to the consortium, we are eager to hear from your institution on where it is today and where it is planning to go with online/blended learning and MOOCs. In turn, for participating member institutions in the MicroMasters program and other educational programs, edX offers its members a variety of technical, marketing, and educational services (i.e., training, onboarding, high-level program management, learner technical support, course strategy, design, build, run and re-run consultations involving data analytics, and so on).
If you are interested in partnering with edX to offer courses and programs, please visit business.edx.org/partner.
If you are a business or corporation interested in using edX to train and develop your employees, please visit business.edx.org.

messages.prospectus.careers.2U.h1-title: Join the movement that’s unlocking the potential of learners everywhere
messages.prospectus.careers.2U.text.paragraph-1: edX, a 2U, Inc. brand, is a leading global online learning platform. Together with the majority of the world’s top-ranked universities and industry-leading companies, we bring our community of over 45 million learners world-class education to support them at every stage of their lives and careers, from free courses to full degrees.
messages.prospectus.careers.2U.text.paragraph-2: We’re always looking for talented professionals who share that vision. Are you passionate about creating transformative educational opportunities? Visit the 2U careers page to learn more about our competitive benefits, guiding principles, DEI journey and office locations.
messages.prospectus.careers.description.paragraph: Looking to make a difference by working directly with learners? Consider becoming a boot camp instructor.

Boot camps with edX prepare learners to launch or advance their careers in in-demand, digital fields. These immersive learning experiences give learners the market-ready skills, comprehensive support services and valuable development resources they need to pursue life-changing professional pathways.
Our expert instructors are core to that mission. If you’re an experienced professional with industry expertise and a passion for education, visit the link below to see open instructor roles.

messages.prospectus.course.detail.main.ofac.answe: Unfortunately, learners residing in one or more of the following countries or regions will not be able to register for this course: Iran, Cuba and the Crimea region of Ukraine. While edX has sought licenses from the U.S. Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) to offer our courses to learners in these countries and regions, the licenses we have received are not broad enough to allow us to offer this course in all locations. edX truly regrets that U.S. sanctions prevent us from offering all of our courses to everyone, no matter where they live.

messages.prospectus.maas.painted.door.chatbot.sur: Hi there! We're so glad you're here. Our live chat isn't available yet but we'd appreciate it if you could take a minute to answer 3 questions and give us your feedback so we can make edX better for everyone

These responses will only be used internally for product improvement purposes. edX will use your information in accordance with edX's privacy policy. For more information regarding edX's privacy policy
What brings you to our chat?
I want to learn specific details about a particular learning option
I'm curious about the benefits of online learning.
I need help being matched to the best learning option for me
I can't find what I'm looking for
May we contact you by email with follow up questions?
(If you respond “yes” to this question, your name and email will be collected on the next page. Otherwise, press "no" to complete the survey)
How could we make this chat experience better for you?
I'd like the chat to friendly/personalized to me
Thank you for completing our survey!

messages.prospectus.profEd.benefits-item1: Increased marketability in job market. Add new skills and certificates to your resume to increase your attractiveness to future employers.
messages.prospectus.profEd.benefits-item2: On your schedule. Dates are available throughout the year to make sure you have multiple options and flexibility.
messages.prospectus.profEd.benefits-item3: No travel necessary. You no longer need to leave your family and friends or take time off work to go to on-site, more expensive seminars and conferences.
messages.prospectus.profEd.benefits-item4: More affordable. Most courses are at a fraction of the cost of their on-site equivalents.
messages.prospectus.profEd.benefits-item5: Added value. Many of our courses come with Continuing Education Units (CEUs), certifications, tangible products and more all in addition to an institutional branded certificate
messages.prospectus.profEd.card-section-title: Advance Your Career with edX Professional Education
messages.prospectus.profEd.main-body-benefits-tit: The benefits of edX Professional Education
messages.prospectus.profEd.main-body-content: edX professional education courses are designed to provide working professionals the ability to advance their skill-sets and careers and enhance their resumes without disrupting their busy schedules. Typically running for a few weeks, courses are geared to specific industries or skill sets, with an emphasis on learnings and hands-on scenarios from the field. Focusing on innovation and emerging fields, edX Professional Education courses will prepare you for the 21st-century workplace.
messages.prospectus.profEd.main-body-content-2: All Professional Education courses are fee-based, with specific costs varying by course. Many courses offer students Continuing Education Units (CEUs) or professional education credit, and all courses offer students a personalized Professional Certificate of Achievement.
messages.prospectus.profEd.main-body-content-3: Move your career forward and earn recognition from leading academic and industry experts.
messages.prospectus.profEd.main-body-quote: "The course instructor is a first class educator, if you are a working professional, you can expect a rigorous training program delivered with a rare and infectious passion."
messages.prospectus.profEd.subtitle: Specialized training and professional education from the world’s best educators and leading industry experts.
messages.prospectus.program.detail.main.ofac.answ: Unfortunately, learners residing in one or more of the following countries or regions will not be able to register for this program: Iran, Cuba and the Crimea region of Ukraine. While edX has sought licenses from the U.S. Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) to offer our programs to learners in these countries and regions, the licenses we have received are not broad enough to allow us to offer this program in all locations. edX truly regrets that U.S. sanctions prevent us from offering all of our programs to everyone, no matter where they live.

messages.prospectus.verified-certificate.cta-2.ti: edX Courses are Always Free to Audit
messages.prospectus.verified-certificate.faq-item: Verified certificates are certificates of completion with a fee that varies by course. Many learners use verified certificates for job and school applications.
Verified certificates are available for many edX courses.
Check out all the courses that offer verified certificates in the edX course catalog.
For more information about certificates, see {link} in the edX Learner’s Guide.
Certificates
What is a verified certificate?

Upgrading to the verified certificate track will give you access to graded assignments so you can work towards a passing score to earn a certificate. If you plan to use your course for job applications, promotions, or school applications, you may prefer to have a certificate that is verifiable. It’s also a great way to give yourself an incentive to complete the course and celebrate your success.
The funds collected from verified certificate track enrollments go toward class creation and improving edX. You help support the edX mission and other learners by upgrading to the verified track.
Why should I sign up for a verified certificate?

After purchasing the verified track you will be able to complete the graded assignments within the course. To receive a certificate you will need a passing total score before the course end date. The minimum passing score needed and your total score is shown on the progress tab within the course.
How do I earn a certificate after upgrading to the verified track?
Many of edX’s past courses are available as archives. These courses can only be audited, and some features, such as the discussion forums, may not be available.
No certificates are available for archived courses.
What is an archived course?
Course certificates are available for a fee that varies by course.
Program certificates are available when you successfully complete a series of courses that make up a program.
edX offers two types of certificate. Note that not all courses offer certificates, and that archived courses do not offer certificates.
What types of certificates does edX offer?
Yes, you can request a refund for up to two weeks from the course start date. Please reach out to {link} to ask for a refund.
Can I get a refund if I change my mind?
messages.prospectus.verified-certificate.faq.head: common questions about verified certificates
messages.prospectus.verified-certificate.help-cen: Learn More on the edX Help Center
messages.prospectus.verified-certificate.page.cta: Browse our current offerings and find a verified certificate course to take.
messages.prospectus.verified-certificate.page.pro: Impress your employer with a verified certificate that documents your learning.
Sometimes we all need that extra push. Working towards a certificate keeps you motivated.
Share your verified certificate with others securely through a dedicated link that we provide.
messages.prospectus.verified-certificate.page.sec: Sometimes you want to take a course just for the sheer joy of learning something new. But sometimes you need to complete a course for a better job, a promotion, or a college application.
A verified certificate from edX can provide proof for an employer, school, or other institution that you have successfully completed an online course.
Why you should purchase a verified certificate
messages.prospectus.verified-certificate.page.wal: With this track, you will have access to all course materials including graded assignments, which we use to assess your knowledge of the subject area and determine whether you’ve mastered the material to earn a certificate.
You will have unlimited access to this course material (as long as it exists on edX) to keep on learning, and brush up on what you’ve learned at any time.
Gain unlimited access to course content and videos

When you pass your course, you'll receive your certificate. You can share your certificate with friends, employers and others through an easy-to-share link we provide, or in certain cases stack it towards a larger credential, such as a Professional Certificate or MicroMasters® program.
Showcase your accomplishment on your LinkedIn profile or resume
edX uses your contribution to support our mission to provide quality education to everyone around the world, and to improve learning through research.
